channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. indictment against Venezuela President Maduro, wife is unsealed
item.description: The indictment was unsealed hours after U.S. forces launched an attack on Venezuela and captured its president Nicolas Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flor...

item.title: This could be a better — and safer — way into the AI trade in 2026

item.description: Russia and Iran broadly condemned the U.S. attack on Venezuela, while other world leaders called for de-escalation and said they are monitoring the si...

item.title: Watch: Trump addresses the nation following U.S. strike against Venezuela
item.description: President Donald Trump is scheduled to speak Saturday morning following a stunning, large-scale attack on Venezuela overnight.

item.title: Trump says U.S. has captured Venezuela's Maduro. What happens next in markets.
U.S. attacks Venezuela, captures Maduro and his wife; AG Bondi says charges include 'Narco-Terrorism'
item.description: Maduro and his wife were captured and removed from the country following the operation, Trump said in a statement on Truth Social.

item.title: They say the first days of January predict the stock market’s year. Not so fast.

item.title: Why retirement investors should beware of this ‘Marie Antoinette’ market
